query:
SELECT 
  t.id as topicId,
  t.title,
  COUNT(q.id) as questionCount
FROM topics t
LEFT JOIN questions q ON t.id = q.topicId
WHERE t.courseId = 2
GROUP BY t.id, t.title
ORDER BY t.id;
command:

  t.title,
  COUNT(q.id) as questionCount

LEFT JOIN questions q ON t.id = q.topicId

ORDER BY t.id;
